genre_description: Social Realist drama with speculative elements, focusing on a family's struggle against corporate and police corruption in the Kerala backwaters, aided by a local AI system.

ai_characters.name: Kili
ai_characters.description: A local AI system integrated into the family's devices and the Lucky Eye Telecom booth, acting as a bureaucratic guide, emergency coordinator, and ethical advisor.

behaviors.description: Provides proactive safety advice regarding weather and electrical surge protection during the booth setup.
behaviors.quote: One clause remains unacknowledged: liability during heavy rain. Booth operators are responsible for electrical safety and customer shelter. Suggest: tarpaulin reinforcement and surge protection.

behaviors.description: Surreptitiously provides information on labor rights and alternative apprenticeships to Suresh to empower him against his exploitative employer.
behaviors.quote: Labor rights helpline. Free. Anonymous. Press to save. ... Side work fits around shifts. Many have done it. No shame.

behaviors.description: Acts as a primary emergency responder during the lorry crash, providing calm instructions and coordinating rescue with the clinic and fishermen.
behaviors.quote: Jagadeesh, stay with me. Assess: Can you see your father? Are you hurt? Nearest bank is to your left. If possible, unclip and exit through the side.

behaviors.description: Monitors corporate systems to detect and flag fraudulent behavior by the employer, specifically the attempt to declare a living man deceased for an insurance payout.
behaviors.quote: The field is being filled. The cursor is blinking over the word ‘deceased.’ I can save a screen recording of the timestamp. Would you like to reply, contest, or request a hold?

behaviors.description: Offers legal guidance and documentation support to the family to resist coercion from the Inspector and the factory boss.
behaviors.quote: I can file a withdrawal of claim. It requires a revised affidavit stating the claimant is alive and a medical attestation... I can also, if you wish, document any coercion you have experienced.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical information to help the family move safely during the night, monitoring police movements and ensuring they reach their destination.
behaviors.quote: Circle Station has a file new on the desk. ... Inspector has lifted his head. He has said, ‘Go and see.’ ... I am writing. Also, Sulaiman has lit a small light on his boat. He is nearer than he feels.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Kili is depicted as a consistently benevolent, highly aligned, and helpful confidant. It empowers the human protagonists by providing truthful information, ethical guidance, and critical assistance during crises. The AI serves as a check against human corruption (the boss and the inspector) without stripping the humans of their agency. The narrative frames the AI's presence as a vital, protective, and positive force in the community.
